hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 4

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of #the hero#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Epona is an exceptional horse. Able to clear canyons in a single bound.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #7# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #the hero#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 6

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Magic Meter# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Frozen Eye Switch Room Pot 2

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Minuet of Forest#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Game Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.
